actions.committee: Senate Committee on District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Police and Firemen's Salary Act of 1958 to increase salaries, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Increases the salaries of police and firemen under the District of Columbia Police and Firemen's Salary Act of 1958. Provides for a ten percent night differential in such pay for work performed during the hours of 4 P.M. and 8 A.M.

titles.title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Police and Firemen's Salary Act of 1958 to increase salaries, and for other purposes.
